title: Drag Brunch Saved My Life
overview: Get ready to sashay and saut√© with the new restaurant revamp lifestyle series, DRAG BRUNCH SAVED MY LIFE. The series showcases world-renowned drag superstar, Priyanka, as she and a team of culinary connoisseurs visit restaurants across Ontario, helping transform their businesses with all-new vibes, and culminating in the ultimate drag brunch extravaganza.
